result.eng: I have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ga: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.orig: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin de
result.html: Bíonn cithfholcadh agam cuirim orm mo chuid éadaí glanaim mo chuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn ciṫḟolcaḋ agam cuirim orm mo ċuid éadaí glanaim mo ċuid fiacla agus mar sin deI have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ga: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.orig: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.html: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuachtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċár á ġreadaḋ ar a ċéile le fuaċtHis teeth were chattering from cold.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
